column5: I am looking for a bunch of rear projection TV screens any size any resolution.  If you have a rear projection TV that is no good or know of any I would really appreciate getting them (just the screen)  I am working on a project and if this works out I will have some very helpful information for any of you outdoor types.
So what do you plan on frying Cliff....
Best firestarter there is! Just be careful where you store the reflector.
I found it so much easier to carry waterproof matches in my pack than a 53" Sony.

Anything I want LOL This is a little more indepth than that though.   No kidding!!!!! If I can get this to work out the way I am thinking it will do a lot more than you can with your water proof matches.
http://www.canadianoutdoorequipment.com/store/reflector-oven-by-svante-freden.html  ?  Enquiring minds want to know  Cheers, Mark

check your local county recycling center  when i dropped my old rear projector off a few weeks back, there were a bunch more in there as well.. this was wellington county so not really in your neighbourhood.
There is a wreckers just south of hwy # 7 in Lindsay that recycles old tvs...you might get what you want there for a price...I hear they pay $0.10 a pound for tvs...
What do they pay for mothers in law? Ba dump bump.
